snippet.title: Sea Horizon - Official Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Big announcement!!! We are going on Switch!!!
Thanks to Eastasiasoft, the video looks fantastic.

Sea Horizon is a Roguelike turn-based RPG. You can explore the world by choosing different characters. Every journey can be unique and legendary. But don’t forget the darkness is lurking. Choose your path wisely because every single step is essential.

Steam Store👇👇
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1611420/Sea_Horizon/

Follow Sea Horizon: https://twitter.com/PlaySeaHorizon
Follow Eastasiasoft: https://twitter.com/eastasiasoft

#PlaySeaHorizon #gamedev #indiedev #Roguelike #turnbased #RPG
